Key Takeaways

  • It's about the what, why - not about the how
  • Forget human limitations, you are working with a machine
  • Fail often, learn fast, adapt and change continuously (start from scratch)

How I approach it

  • Best of breed for tools AI (rate of change is measured in months)
  • It's like working with someone who takes creative liberties with your instructions
  • It only has short term memory, and not much to speak of - manage the context window limits

Notes

  • For now, better application software, not IaC software
